trans-unit.source: Validates expression conditions.
trans-unit.target: Valida as condições de expressão.

trans-unit.source: The following code creates an invalid condition.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir cria uma condição inválida.

trans-unit.source: It then attempts to validate the condition, and displays any errors that result.
trans-unit.target: Ele tenta validar a condição e exibe todos os erros resultantes.

trans-unit.source: Running this code produces the following error:
trans-unit.target: Executando este código produz o seguinte erro:

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />.

trans-unit.source: The type of the object that this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> or <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> will be executed against.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto contra o qual essa <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> será executada.

trans-unit.source: Normally it is the workflow, but it can be any valid type.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente isso se trata do fluxo de trabalho, mas pode ser qualquer tipo válido.

trans-unit.source: An optional <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider" /> implementation that is used to determine what <see cref="T:System.Type" />s are available in the condition.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider" /> opcional que é usada para determinar quais <see cref="T:System.Type" />s estão disponíveis na condição.

trans-unit.source: If one is not specified, only types in the assembly specified by the activity and any assemblies it references are available.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum for especificado, somente tipos no assembly especificado pela atividade e todos os assemblies aos quais ele fizer referência estarão disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> class using the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.Type" /> da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="thisType" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="thisType" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> in which context the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> or <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> is run.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> em cujo contexto o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> é executado.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, this will be the workflow object.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, esse será o objeto de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An optional <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider" /> implementation that is used to determine what <see cref="T:System.Type" />s are available in the condition.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider" /> opcional que é usada para determinar quais <see cref="T:System.Type" />s estão disponíveis na condição.

trans-unit.source: If one is not specified, only types in the assembly specified by the activity and any assemblies it references are available.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum for especificado, somente tipos no assembly especificado pela atividade e todos os assemblies aos quais ele fizer referência estarão disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, the types used by any <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> or <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> that are validated with this object must be in the restricted list of types allowed.
trans-unit.target: Se for <see langword="true" />, os tipos usados por qualquer <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> que forem validados com esse objeto deverão estar na lista restrita de tipos permitidos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> and the type provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> usando o provedor de tipo e as <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> especificadas.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used at design time.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é usado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="activity" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="activity" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the errors associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os erros associados ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError" /> objects created during rule validation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection" /> que contém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError" /> objetos criados durante a validação de regra.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> a ser avaliado.

trans-unit.source: Determines the type of the code expression.
trans-unit.target: Determina o tipo da expressão de código.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionInfo" /> for the object.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionInfo" /> para o objeto.

trans-unit.source: This identifies the type of the object.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o tipo do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Removes and returns the parent expressions at the top of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove e retorna as expressões pai no topo da <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> para adicionar ao <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an object at the top of the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.
trans-unit.target: Insere um objeto na parte superior do <see cref="T:System.Collections.Stack" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="newParent" /> was added to the stack; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <paramref name="newParent" /> foi adicionado à pilha; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the `newParent` is already part of the parent <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> objects, a new <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError> is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o `newParent` já é parte do pai <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> objetos, um novo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationError> é criado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newParent" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newParent" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do objeto.
